body.query: FROM test | sort emp_no | eval x1 = concat(ip1, ip2), x2 = coalesce(x1, "255.255.255.255"), x3 = to_ip(x2) | keep emp_no, x*

Only first 20 failures recorded.", 299 Elasticsearch-8.19.5-35f348833d433845fbc4a9c711e5b4286b2ca34c "Line 1:98: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: '127.00.1' is not an IP string literal."
